name: OCKTaskEvents
desc: A data structure that holds events from a multiplicity of tasks.

items.name: func addEvent(OCKAnyEvent)
items.desc: Adds an event to the task-event data structure.

items.name: func updateEvent(OCKAnyEvent)
items.desc: Updates an event if it exists, otherwise does nothing.

items.name: func event(forIndexPath: IndexPath) -> OCKAnyEvent?
items.desc: Returns the event at an index path, where the section represents the task and the item corresponds to the event index.

items.name: func events(forSection: Int) -> [OCKAnyEvent]?
items.desc: Returns all the events for the task in a section.

items.name: var firstEvent: OCKAnyEvent?
items.desc: Returns the first event from the events in the task-event object.

items.name: var firstEvents: [OCKAnyEvent]?
items.desc: Returns the all events for the first task in the task-event object.

items.name: func containsEvent(OCKAnyEvent) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the given event is already present.
